Plot: A young boy attempts to convince a woman that he is her dead husband reborn.
Title: Birth
Writer: Jean-Claude Carrière, Milo Addica, Jonathan Glazer
Actors: Nicole Kidman, Cameron Bright, Danny Huston, Lauren Bacall
tomatoConsensus: A well-mounted production is undermined by a muddled, absurd storyline of questionable taste.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 wins & 16 nominations.
